getAllAreaDetails.map: function(doc) {if(doc.type == "area"){emit(doc.name, {positive: doc.positive, negative: doc.negative, average_income: doc.average_income, age_distribution: doc.age_distribution, population_density: doc.population_density, area_range: doc.area_range})};}

filters.important: function(doc, req) { if(doc.type == 'tweet') { return true; } else { return false; }}
